(1,): As a system administrator, I want to process deletions for a specific date, so that I can maintain data cleanliness and compliance As a system, I want to prevent double publishing of submissions, so that I can maintain data integrity As a system, I want to log submission activities, so that I can maintain an audit trail of changes As a tester, I want to generate user testing reports, so that I can document test results for agencies As a test coordinator, I want to create a user testing schedule, so that testing activities are well-organized
(2,): As a user, I want to update the publish status of my submission, so that I can track its progress through the system As a user, I want to generate a D file for my submission, so that I can have the required output format As a user, I want to check if the site is locked for GTAS, so that I know when I can perform submissions As a UI designer, I want to update the Resources page, so that users have an improved experience As a user, I want to get the creator of a submission, so that I can contact them if needed As a user, I want to validate DUNS numbers, so that I can ensure they meet requirements for the action type and date
(0,): As a FABS user, I want to validate my file before submission, so that I can ensure it meets all requirements As a system, I want to check if FPDS data has changed, so that I can avoid unnecessary regeneration of D files As a user, I want to add flexfields to my submission efficiently, so that I can include additional data without performance issues
(3,): As a user, I want to get published FABS files, so that I can access completed submissions As a user, I want to derive office names from office codes, so that I can display meaningful information As a user, I want to get updated financial assistance data, so that I can access current information
(1, 2): As a system administrator, I want to lock the site during GTAS periods, so that I can prevent data changes during critical processing windows
